block.p: LEAD: Portugal will buy 20 General Dynamics Corporation F-16 warplanes from the United States in the next three years for $450 million, a military spokesman said. A United States Embassy spokesman here said much of the cost would be met through grants under the Lajes Accord, which covers United States bases on Portugal's mid-Atlantic Azores Islands and military cooperation between the two NATO allies.

LEAD: Portugal will buy 20 General Dynamics Corporation F-16 warplanes from the United States in the next three years for $450 million, a military spokesman said. A United States Embassy spokesman here said much of the cost would be met through grants under the Lajes Accord, which covers United States bases on Portugal's mid-Atlantic Azores Islands and military cooperation between the two NATO allies.

A United States Embassy spokesman here said much of the cost would be met through grants under the Lajes Accord, which covers United States bases on Portugal's mid-Atlantic Azores Islands and military cooperation between the two NATO allies.
